website_summaries.verdict: McAfee Total Protection 2010 hits many of the right notes. It's easy to use and it's effective, but years of below-average releases will likely leave many users unwilling to give it a try.
pros: Two massive steps in the right direction kick off the 2010 version of Total Protection: the new interface and the overhauled performance
This version should go a long way to fixing McAfee's battered reputation
cons: It might not be clear enough that running a full scan when installing will significantly speed up later scans
There's not much in the way of easily accessible live support, either, so if something goes wrong, it may take a while to get a human on the phone

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using McAfee for a couple of years now. My subscription renewal was due in mid November. Checking with McAfee's website before my renewal showed a renewal price of $69.99 for this product. By purchasing from Amazon, I saved half the money at a cost of reinstalling my software. No brainer there. From a technical standpoint, the program does what I expect it to do. I also do not have to modify the settings to be able to access some of my favorite websites as I have had to do with other software. All in all, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: No Protection without Proper Installation
customer_reviews.text: Product would not completely install. This was an upgrade. After about 10 days it deactivated itself and left my pc open to attack. Attempts to do a web correction with customer support assistance were aggregating as heck. Rather than going right to the problem posted to initiate the support session they asked me unrelated questions and attempted to steer me toward paid support. McAfee Total Protection 1User 2010: $23.27, Total Time to Implement: 14 days, Total Pain: Immeasurable, Total Future Purchase of McAfee Software: Zero Dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Mack W. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: protection at a cost
customer_reviews.text: McAfee Total Protection has changed from a year ago. Now it is continually at work protecting. Every day it 'updates' virus protecion which lasts about half an hour, slowing down email process. Once or twice a day 'computer and files' are not protected and has to be fixed. Every Friday it scans the computer, which takes hours. I appreciate the protection but regret the continuous delays.
customer_reviews.author: R. Farr

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product after I was infected with two trojan virus's while using AVAST home protection. AVAST was great at notifying me when i had a virus but didn't help in preventing me from getting the virus in the first place. This product has kept me away from any possible threat, has not slowed down my system and makes me feel very secure. And the price for it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna G

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I've used several anti-virus, anti-malware software. So far, even taking into consideration the advances made over the years, I find this version of McAfee to be a superior product. Set It and Forget It. It performs the scanning and updates automatically. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Speeds up computer while offering maximum protection
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Norton, but with doing genealogy I thought my computer had just about had it. I find all the features (except one minor one) that McAfee has and they are easier to find. My computer is faster than it has been in years and I can clean it with the touch of a button daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: McAfee wanted me to pay $50 to renew this online. I bought it from a 3rd party for $18. Its a good product. I haven't had any problems with virus etc. It arrived in a timely manner in good condition. My only complaint would be that it comes with a year of online backup. The amount that they are willing to store is probably about half my hard drive, not very helpful. You can pay more money to get more storage, but it wasn't worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: neysagp

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: McAfee is the only one i will use, yes i have used others. But McAfee is an industry standard. Does not hog resources like many others due.
customer_reviews.author: N. L. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've used McAfee for four years now; after using Norton and being constantly frustrated. No comparison-McAfee is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better safe than sorry
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product . Kept my pc protected the entire duration of the install. Woul recommend for all pc users. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: pbuck11

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The box when I received it was banged up pretty badly. I don't know if it was shipped that way from the shipper or the post office. The CD was not damaged, but I do wish that Amazon or the shipper would take more care in packing items ordered. As far as the merchandise, I am will satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: McAfee Review
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much. I got the program in perfect condition and it did not take very long. I am happy with my purchase and I saved money on it. I really had no problems with the order, and I got exactly what I expected and wanted. I have nothing but good things to say in retrospect. I encourage anybody else who wants McAfee 2010 for one user to buy it the same way that I did off of Amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Retired
customer_reviews.text: This product almost brought my PC to a complete hault. It was taking minutes to change screens. I removed the product from my PC after five days. I would never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: competitive antivirus software.
customer_reviews.text: It is more than just basic antivirus protection and it's fairly easy to install and get all setup.
customer_reviews.author: Maria E. Villegas

customer_reviews.title: McAfee total protection plus 2010
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE McAFEE I HAVE USED IT BEFORE BUT THIS VERSION IS TELLING ME THAT MY NEW VERSION OF MS OFFICE IS NOT LEGAL
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Risinger

customer_reviews.title: Great Timing
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize my current software was about to expire, placed order with expedited shipping and got it just in time. Great Service!
customer_reviews.author: MEG

customer_reviews.title: McAfee Total Protection 1User 2010 review
customer_reviews.text: The product was in a good condition and didn't have any problems in installing the software.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this protection for my laptop and it is horrible. Literally everytime I turn on my computer it tells me something is wrong and it wants to run an hour scan. Of course the scan comes up with nothing because my computer is fine. It will also start scans without my knowledge and it slows my computer down to the point I can't use it and have to cancel the scan. I have not had any problems with my computer besides this service. I will not use them ever again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Seemed good at first, but then....
customer_reviews.text: Seemed good at first, ran quietly in background, kept itself updated. But then I developed a startup problem, took for service, and found the problem was caused by McAfee! Tech deleted the program, now all is well. Like a chump I had recently renewed the service. McAfee won't even talk about refunding, so my choices are to either reinstall a program that messed up my computer or eat the subscription charge. I might consider reinstalling if tech support were more responsive, but they're not, so that's where they've left me. My tech recommended Bit Defender, guess I'll try that next.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS VIRUS PROTECTION PROGRAM. On April 21 2010 McAfee trashed computers all over the country with a download that replaced a critical XP system file. I spent 6 hours on hold and 30 hours rebuilding my system. The CEO David DeWalt promised a free two-year subscription to affected users. Today, I got a renewal notice from McAfee. What? Customer Service said I had a window from May 10 until May 31 and I missed the deadline. I had called on May 5 and was told they would have a link from the web site but neglected to say it would be a limited time offer. There are many freeware and shareware programs that do a great job.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gourley

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for installation on my laptop that had been severely affected by malware, specifically an adware that claimed my computer was being attacked by a malicious virus and I needed to purchase this antivirus software. McAfee Total Protection 2010 was easy enough to install, but had no effect whatsoever on this adware, i.e. it did not highlight it nor eliminate it. I finally took my laptop to the local PC guru who recommended a complete scan and virus clean-up and informed me that there are much more effective antivirus software products than this one. Overall a big disappointment since I trusted the name McAfee
customer_reviews.author: Motor Head

product_meta.title: McAfee Total Protection 1User 2010 [Old Version]
product_meta.description: McAfee Total Protection suite offers you and your family the ultimate PC and online security with accelerated performance. It’s now available with revolutionary Active Protection technology, enabling the fastest updates and highest levels of detection against malicious threats. It provides anti-virus, anti-spyware, anti-spam, anti-phishing, and firewall, in addition to parental controls and identity protection. Also included are a powerful website safety advisor and bonus McAfee Anti-Theft File Protection software.
feature_bullets: Ultimate award-winning PC and online security for total peace of mind
Anti-virus with Active Protection and Super Mode, Anti-spam, Anti-spyware, Anti-phishing, Two-way Firewall and Advanced Web Security
QuickClean to help optimize your PC and Battery Mode
Identity Protection and Parental Controls with Age Appropriate Searching
Advanced Home Network Protection with Network monitoring

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
